SUMMARY

Tachanon Srisook completed his studies in Computer Engineering at Walailak University (WU), located in Nakhon Si Thammarat, Thailand. During his time at the university, he actively participated in various organizational roles within the Student Administration Organization and the Student Union, where he gained significant leadership and administrative experience. His academic journey included a strong focus on practical applications of technology, particularly in the areas of hardware and the Internet of Things (IoT). Through extensive class projects and hands-on experiments, he developed a deep understanding of hardware systems and IoT technologies, which have equipped him with the skills necessary to contribute effectively to innovative technological solutions.
